price: (17) Never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allāh at all. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally
arabic: لَّن تُغۡنِيَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔاۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lan tugh'niya ʿanhum amwāluhum walā awlāduhum mina al-lahi shayan ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri hum fīhā khālidūna
